function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear reference to regions and their average age","Impact":"Misinterpretation of data and incorrect analysis","Mitigation":"Provide clear and specific descriptions of the regions and their average age to avoid misinterpretation","Technologies":"Data visualization tools, statistical software for analysis","People":"Researchers, analysts, policymakers","Owner":"Research team, data analysts"},{"Description":"Misinterpretation of significance level symbols","Impact":"Incorrect statistical inference and conclusions","Mitigation":"Clearly define the significance level symbols in the text or provide a legend for interpretation","Technologies":"Statistical software for analysis, data visualization tools","People":"Statisticians, researchers, analysts","Owner":"Research team, data analysts"}]}
